author: Mike Tanier
title: Cash-Strapped Chiefs Will Ask Even More of Patrick Mahomes in 2020
description: As of last week, the  Chiefs  were the proud owners of precisely $177 in cap space.    That's the number  ESPN's Field Yates reported , though it has already changed. As of Wednesday, the  NFLPA's daily cap report  listed them with $171...
content:
Brynn Anderson/Associated Press
As of last week, the Chiefs were the proud owners of precisely $177 in cap space.
That's the number ESPN's Field Yates reported, though it has already changed. As of Wednesday, the NFLPA's daily cap report listed them with $1… [+6532 chars]
